info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cabarrus, southeastern Mecklenburg and north central Union Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1045 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Uptown Charlotte, or near Mint Hill, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Charlotte, Mint Hill, Lake Park, Hemby Bridge, Mt Pleasant, Midland, Fairview In Union County, Matthews, Indian Trail and Stallings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
